title: AR-Based Molecular Geometry 3D Spatial Arrangement Educational Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemical bonding and molecular structure concepts
context.additional_context: Learners manipulate 3D molecular geometry arrangements through PBL (Project-Based Learning) in an AR environment using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Accurately identify and classify 15 basic molecular geometries (based on VSEPR theory) in 3D space using AR tools
Predict bond angles and stereochemical arrangements with over 90% accuracy by rotating/manipulating molecular models in augmented reality environments
Present molecular structure visualizations through PBL tasks and achieve peer evaluation scores of 4/5 or higher
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
